title: Real Estate Search Platform
subtitle: Mobile-first property search with map clustering
problem: A real estate agency needed a modern, mobile-first property search experience. Their existing platform was slow, desktop-only, and lacked visual map-based discovery. Users couldn't efficiently browse large property datasets, and mobile traffic (65% of users) had poor engagement. Search latency was over 3 seconds, and the map feature was non-functional on mobile devices.
solution: Built a responsive property search platform with React and TypeScript, featuring real-time search with autofill suggestions, interactive map clustering using Leaflet for visual property discovery, and lazy-loaded property cards optimized for mobile. Implemented client-side clustering algorithm to handle 200+ properties smoothly, with search latency under 500ms. Designed mobile-first UI that adapts seamlessly from 400px to desktop widths.
outcomes: Search latency reduced from 3.2s to 420ms (87% improvement)
Property discovery time reduced by 40% with map clustering
100% responsive â€” works flawlessly on all device sizes
